input.sentences: in the woods | there was a broken tree .
there was some water by the rock .
output.sentences: A broken tree stands in the center of a path in the woods.
Nearby, a Preying Mantis sits on a bent flower stem.
Dark blue water runs from a spout into a stream
and a man holds onto a dead palm frond.
A berry hangs on a piece of tall, green grass.
